message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $16,500 for this exceptional item. I am confident it will provide you with significant returns on your investment.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I agree your product looks to be high quality, $16,500 is a bit more than I had budgeted for. I would be willing to purchase the product for $13,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budgetary concerns, but I must respectfully decline your offer. After careful consideration, I am unable to lower the price below $16,500 due to the high value and unique features of our product. However, I am willing to discuss additional terms or potential payment plans that may better suit your financial situation.
